dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach investments and risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, avoiding high-risk opportunities.
Your FarTwin will pursue high-risk investments with the goal of achieving exceptional returns.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge and skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn through images, videos, and other visual aids.
Your FarTwin will learn through listening to lectures, podcasts, or discussions.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly comfortable using digital tools, devices, and platforms.
Your FarTwin prefers to avoid technology or uses it only when necessary.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin enjoys meeting new people and engaging in lively conversations.
Your FarTwin prefers quieter, more low-key social settings or avoids them altogether.

dimensions.label: Goal-Oriented
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach achieving goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin sets clear, achievable objectives and works diligently to reach them.
Your FarTwin strives for exceptional results, often setting lofty targets and pushing themselves hard.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin values teamwork, open communication, and mutual support.
Your FarTwin approaches collaboration with a competitive mindset, seeking to outdo others or achieve individual success.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage personal finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin is mindful of expenses, prioritizing saving and investing over luxury or indulgence.
Your FarTwin enjoys sharing their resources with others, supporting causes or individuals in need.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize time?

options.description: Your FarTwin values organization, prioritizing tasks and managing their time to achieve maximum productivity.
Your FarTwin takes a more flexible approach to time management, often leaving room for spontaneity or flexibility.
